goal.ch: 介紹數位系統之基礎概念，利用各種實例，對相關主題作深入淺出之說明，期能使學生瞭解數位電路的基本組成元件、及數位電路設計的方法。
goal.en: Students are expected to understand the basic components and functionalities of digital system, and know how to design basic digital circuits.

outline.ch: ◎ Introduction to digital systems◎ Boolean algebra◎ Combinational logic◎ Binary numbers and arithmetic circuits◎ Synchronous sequential logic◎ Registers and Counters
outline.en: ◎ Introduction to digital systems◎ Boolean algebra◎ Combinational logic◎ Binary numbers and arithmetic circuits◎ Synchronous sequential logic◎ Registers and Counters

textbook.ch: (1) William J. Dally and R. Curtis Harting, “Digital Design: A Systems Approach, 2012, Cambridge University Press. (2) Morris Mano and Michael Ciletti, “Digital Design: With An Introduction to The Verilog HDL, VHDL, and System Verilog,“ 6th Edition, Pearson Education ISBN 978-1-292-23116-7 (3) Charles Roth and Larry Kinney, “Fundamentals of Logic Design,“ 7th Edition, Cengage Learning ISBN-13: 978-1133628477
